options.name: Operator
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Weapon Systems and +1 Technology. You can operate complex weapon systems with expertise.

options.name: Targeting Systems
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Weapon Systems. You can use advanced targeting software to overcome cover and concealment penalties.

options.name: System Diagnostics
options.description: Gain +1 Technology. You can quickly diagnose and repair malfunctions in weapon systems as a bonus action.

options.name: Optimized Systems
options.description: Gain +1 Damage with Weapon Systems. You can enhance weapon system performance beyond normal specifications.

options.name: Action : Overcharge Weapons
options.description: Temporarily overcharge a weapon system for one round. The next attack with that system deals an additional 2d6 damage but cannot be used again for 1d4 rounds.

options.name: Reaction : Emergency Shutdown
options.description: When a weapon system would malfunction or explode, you can instantly shut it down to prevent damage or further issues.

options.name: Multi-System Specialist
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Weapon Systems and +1 Technology. You can operate and coordinate multiple weapon systems simultaneously.

options.name: Action : Precision Strike
options.description: Take careful aim with a weapon system. Your next attack ignores all cover bonuses and deals an additional 2d8 damage on a hit.

options.name: System Override
options.description: Gain +1 Technology. You can bypass safety protocols to push weapon systems beyond their designed limits, increasing their damage by 50% for one attack.

options.name: Master Operator
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Weapon Systems. You can use your action to assume direct control of automated defense systems within 100 feet, turning them against their owners.
